document_data.name: Reginald
document_data.mainbody: '''Reginald''' was a corrupt sergeant of [[Hillsfar]]'s [[Red Plumes]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/Bane of the Tradeways|8}}
document_data.Personality: Reginald was well mannered and well spoken, acting with courtesy and professionalism. But his charm hid the truth, that inside he was moved only by avarice and ambition.
document_data.History:
''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], he decided to make money kidnapping non-[[human]] farmers around the city and selling them to [[duergar]] slavers. However, some angry farmers hired bandits to have revenge.

A bandit group including [[Karl]] attacked a caravan protected by Reginald and his men.{{Cite adventurers league/Bane of the Tradeways|20}}
